data.title: much better than the ratings suggest!!! Recommend!
data.text: We stopped here for lunch. We were able to eat at a table outside. The online reviews didn't sufficiently represent the quality of food and drink that we received as well as service. The burgers that we ordered were great and large quantities. Fries were done, buffalo chips were done, homemade ranch...great place to stop for lunch. The interior/bathrooms, etc...just need some upkeep :)

data.title: Relaxed atmosphere, great service, burger, well....
data.text: First time there and was craving a burger. We had nice, fast service, but the burger patty was probably the worst we've ever had. The toppings on the burger were good, but the patty itself, please improve, it won't take much. I'm sure the the rest of the food on the menu is good, just haven't tried, so not fair to judge.

data.title: Cheeseburgers!
data.text: Fresh salads and dressings. Iced Tea is always fresh and the beer is always cold. If you can't find something you are willing to try ... get the cheeseburger (sub, wrap or regular!) - they are very good.

data.title: Nice Atmosphere and Good Wrap
data.text: Ate here with friends. Was recommended to us by a local walking near by. I loved my wrap and I also felt the prices were in line with what they should be. Would definitely eat here again.

data.title: Night out
data.text: Stopped in just for a drink and ended up getting a table. The atmosphere is welcoming and the staff is great. Great place to stop with friends.

data.title: Wonderful visit!!!
data.text: This establishment is well staffed with great food! The gallimore is made to perfection and my husband enjoyed his Cornerstone club! Our wait staff, Mike who made a beautiful Vodka Collins and Emily who was attentive our entire meal! We will be back to this unique restaurant in the heart of downtown :)

data.title: Local hangout, good food
data.text: We came for dinner, got a table outside. Obviously a spot for locals. Had a great meal. Not fancy at all

data.title: Good food and friendly service
data.text: I like the staff and the food but the atmosphere really needs some work.  Everything I have eaten at Cornerstone was good.  The interior needs a major facelift.  The carpet, floors etc..... the ladies room is horrid.

data.title: Roanoke's Version of Cheers
data.text: It is a comfortable and simple bar in downtown Roanoke. It is larger than you think with some event space upstairs. The bar is the focus and it has it's regulars, but everyone is fun and friendly. In the winter it is always cold inside. The last time there I was there for a get together with catered food. I can happily say that this "bar" is also extremely capable of putting out excellent food. So, its an awesome stop while downtown in Roanoke shopping, exploring, or even as a destination for fun with friends.

data.title: Average food, rough staff, dinge feel.
data.text: My wife, son and I ate here for the first time. The wraps we had were average. The fries were lukewarm and so was the water. The sweet tea had a bad aftertaste. The floor inside is dingy and the staff were rough looking. Our waitress was unfamiliar with the menu items. Overall average experience.

data.title: Horrible
data.text:
Had an early lunch at work and came in with 6 people total including myself for lunch. First thing we asked the waitress was will we be able to eat in under an hour. We were all dressed in business dress and she should know being there that we have limited time for lunch. She told us an hour would be no issue. We got our drinks and placed out order and began the wait that would end with no food. 
20 minutes after we placed our order our waitress came back to verify our order... (concerned then) We asked have you not put our order in yet because if so we wont have enough time and will go else where. She ensured us that the order was in and she just wanted to check it.
When we came in we were the only people on second and third floor. Since there have been 6 other groups from 2-5 that have came in and also ordered food. 10 minutes go by and a group of 4 who sat down 10 minutes after us got their food. At this point we asked to talk to a manager. Our waitress then came back another 10 minutes later and we asked about manager and asked for him to bring the food as we needed to talk with him. She said that he couldn't come up at the moment because he is busy finishing our food. After a final 10 minutes we had had enough because every table that sat down after us had already gotten their food and 3 groups already ate and left. 

We got up and walked out. Do not eat at this place if u want to "EAT"!

data.title: New Year's eve Celebration
data.text: Came here with my two friends from out of time to ring in the new year. It has three levels, which you would never know for the outside. Each floor is kind of narrow but the bar tenders were great and worked hard to serve everyone quickly. The dance floor is nice and right at the front door with the bar behind that. The DJ struggled a little at the beginning to get good songs on but picked up later in the evening and had a good variety of songs. The bathroom were in bad disrepair with the women's door not even closing/locking. It was a little messy but that's to be expected on a very hectic night. Overall I would definitely return and enjoyed my night there.
